title: Pound Cake
steps: Preheat oven to 325°F. Grease and flour bundt pan.
Beat butter and sugar until very light and fluffy, 5 minutes.
Add eggs one at a time, beating after each.
Combine flour and salt. Add alternately with sour cream, starting and ending with flour.
Pour into pan. Bake 60-75 minutes until toothpick comes out clean.
Cool in pan 15 minutes, then turn out.
notes: Creaming butter and sugar is the key to texture.
Don't open oven door for first 45 minutes.
